briefdescription.para: Calculates the register address for a specific fan (N) based on the Fan 1 register address and known offset.

parameterdescription.para: The fan number (0-4 to match fan enum).
The address of the corresponding Fan 1 register (base)

simplesect.para: The calculated register address for Fan N.

memberdef.name: EMC2305_CFG_MASK_ALERT
memberdef.initializer: (1u << 7) /* MASK - mask ALERT pin when set */

memberdef.name: EMC2305_CFG_DRECK
memberdef.initializer: (1u << 1) /* DRECK - CLK pin drives internal clock when set (output) */

memberdef.name: EMC2305_CFG_USECK
memberdef.initializer: (1u << 0) /* USECK - use external CLK pin as tach clock when set */

briefdescription.para: Initializes the I2C bus and validates the chip by reading the Product ID and Manufacturer ID.
Software locks all SWL registers. SWL registers are now read-only until power cycle.
Sets the EMC2305 global configuration register based on provided config.
Sets the base frequency of the specified fan's PWM driver.

parameterdescription.para: Base frequency as specified in Section 6.10

briefdescription.para: Sets the EMC2305 configuration 1 and 2 registers based on the provided config.
Sets the specified fan's PWM driver to open-drain or push-pull.

parameterdescription.para: Set to true for open-drain (only driven low, requires pullup) or false for push-pull (driven high and low, no pullup)

briefdescription.para: Sets the PWM drive of the specified fan directly. Works only with fan speed control (FSC) disabled.
Sets the RPM target for the control algorithm. Works only with fan speed control (FSC) enabled.
Gets current fan RPM based on tachometer measurement.

simplesect.para: Measured fan RPM. UINT16_MAX on error

briefdescription.para: Gets current fan driver PWM duty cycle.

simplesect.para: Driven fan PWM duty cycle (0-100). UINT8_MAX on error

briefdescription.para: Gets current fan status for all drivers.
Reads a byte of data from the specified register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer where register data will be stored

simplesect.para: OK if successful, ERR if message queue is full

briefdescription.para: Writes a byte of data to the specified register.

simplesect.para: OK if successful, ERR if message queue is full
